dashboard.free.heading: Build your foundation with the Free plan
dashboard.free.subtitle: Keep journaling your trades and learning from the community. Upgrade when you are ready to connect providers and automate.
dashboard.free.cta_helper: Unlock a 30-day trial with managed API keys and full platform access.
dashboard.free.available.title: Included today
dashboard.free.available.description: Use these tools to document ideas, track trades, and learn from others.
dashboard.free.available.logbook.title: Trading logbook
dashboard.free.available.logbook.descrip: Record trades, journal reflections, and keep personal notes on your strategies.
dashboard.free.available.forum.title: Community forum
dashboard.free.available.forum.descripti: Participate in discussions, share insights, and learn alongside other investors.
dashboard.free.locked.title: What you unlock with a trial
dashboard.free.locked.description: Activate a Trial, Managed, or Pro plan to access advanced automation and insights.
dashboard.free.locked.integrations.title: Provider integrations
dashboard.free.locked.integrations.descr: Connect AI, market data, news, and trading APIs to centralize your workflow.
dashboard.free.locked.automation.title: Automation workflows
dashboard.free.locked.automation.descrip: Trigger analyses, alerts, and provider actions automatically based on your rules.
dashboard.free.locked.analytics.title: Advanced analytics & alerts
dashboard.free.locked.analytics.descript: Unlock dashboards, performance metrics, and proactive alerting as soon as you upgrade.
